document_data.mainbody:
ist Darbonna was a member of the Flaming Fist and a healer who served the city of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Darbonna was a human woman with tan skin, bluish-green eyes, and shortly-trimmed brown curly hair. She wore a uniform of the Flaming Fist – a set of splint mail and a tabard adorned with the Flaming Fist insignia, with a large hammer strapped to her back.
In the , Darbonna was stationed just outside one of the gates between the Lower City of Baldurs Gate and its more affluent Upper City. Her and other fellow Fists job was stopping rabble from entering the Upper City, allowing only those with much coin through. The Fists managed a slow-moving queue of rich and poor – city folk trying to return home or just find safety behind the second set of walls.
